windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: Several common archive utilities allow you to extract files from split archives. For example, in 7-Zip (Windows), you can right-click a split archive's 001 file and select 7-Zip â†’ Extract Here to extract the archive's contents. Before doing so, make sure:
You have all the split archive's pieces.
You've stored all the pieces in the same directory.

Note, however, that because several programs can create split archives, some split archives are formatted differently than others. If you're having trouble opening a split archive, it might be because the program you're using does not support that split archive format. (Alternatively, it might be because you do not have all the split archive's pieces).
